node.title: My Temperament in God's Hand, Part 1
node.description: Discover your own temperament and learn to understand others in theirs. Learn how Abraham, Moses, John, Peter and Paul had special temperaments that were changed and made useful to God through His wonderful grace and creative power. We will get to know the four temperaments, their strengths and weaknesses, challenges, spiritual dilemmas and God’s solutions. IT IS TIME !
